description: The AWS::SecurityHub::ProductSubscription resource represents a subscription to a service that is allowed to generate findings for your Security Hub account. One product subscription resource is created for each product enabled.

ProductArn.description: The generic ARN of the product being subscribed to
ProductArn.markdownDescription:
The generic ARN of the product being subscribed to

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws\S*:securityhub:\S*  
Update requires: Replacement

ProductSubscriptionArn.description: The ARN of the product subscription for the account
ProductSubscriptionArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the product subscription for the account

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws\S*:securityhub:\S*  
Update requires: No interruption
